subject: Create CompanionConfig and SessionMode Types
description:
Implement CompanionConfig struct with environment variable parsing and SessionMode enum (Local/Remote). Create maestro-cli/src/claude/companion.rs with unit tests for config parsing. Add tokio-tungstenite dependency.

Files:
- Create: maestro-cli/src/claude/companion.rs
- Modify: maestro-cli/src/claude/mod.rs
- Modify: maestro-cli/Cargo.toml

Expected: 4 tests pass (disabled, local config, remote requires JWT, remote with JWT)
